section01.businessDescription: We are a family business dedicated to artisanal coffee roasting and the export of microlots of high-altitude green coffee.

callToAction.subtitle: A commitment to quality
callToAction.title: Enjoy a variety of coffee!
callToAction.description: Café San Luis is a line of coffees from the beautiful region of San Luis, Comayagua, Honduras and that seeks to satisfy the most varied and demanding tastes.

artisanCoffeeRoasting.title: Artisan Coffee Roasting
artisanCoffeeRoasting.description: The roasting method is as important as the coffee itself; artisanal roasting exposes the characteristics of the coffee in a unique and unmatched way.

microlotCoffee.title: Microlots of coffee
microlotCoffee.description: Together with our network of producers throughout Honduras, we offer you a wide variety of coffee with the best characteristics of the region.

packaging.title: Packaging
packaging.description: We offer you a wide variety of packaging for your products.

knowAboutUs.title: Learn more about us
knowAboutUs.author: Brayan Herrera
knowAboutUs.message: I welcome you to this community of producers and on behalf of all of us I thank you for considering this project or any of our products and services.

inHonduras.title: It's in Honduras
inHonduras.description: Are you looking for a coffee with a specific profile?

businessBiography.paragraph1: We are a family business that began operations in the summer of 2015 in the remote area of ​​the town of San Luis, Comayagua, Honduras.
businessBiography.paragraph2: In 2010, we began the project as coffee producers in the San Luis area of ​​the department of Comayagua, Honduras;
